Texts.Chs: ...ahf'- fm'latgh geb ehye chtenff k'yarnak...
Texts.Eng: ...ahf'- fm'latgh geb ehye chtenff k'yarnak...

Texts.Chs: ...kn'a lw'nafh nilgh'ri ooboshu phlegeth shtunggli...
Texts.Eng: ...kn'a lw'nafh nilgh'ri ooboshu phlegeth shtunggli...

Texts.Chs: <耳语的声音变大了>
Texts.Eng: <the whispers are growing louder>

Texts.Chs: <你听到了黑暗中的某种私语>
Texts.Eng: <you hear some sort of whispers in the dark>

Texts.Chs: 先生，我不建议你吞噬自己的身体，因为你终究还是会把自己吃完，那时候你还剩什么呢？再说了，如今你已经血流不止，你应该停下这种毫无意义的行为。
Texts.Eng: Biting ones own body and eating it is probably not the best idea, sir. I don't suggest doing that again. Eventually you'll run out of pieces, and then what will you have left to eat? Also, now you're bleeding everywhere. Nicely done.
Fascinating! A mutated form of ^red;*******^reset;, one I've never seen the likes of before. Be careful, though. They appear rabid, and may possess any number of terrible ^red;******^reset; diseases.
How odd! I can only recognize one signature from our database. I am also picking up readings that match nothing I've ^red;****^reset;. The connec^red;*** ***^reset;blems are ^red;****^reset; scans.
I ^red;******* *****^reset; ? We should ^red;******^reset; before it is ^red;******^reset;. Okay?

Texts.Chs: 我发现^red;*****^reset;^red;*嗡嗡*^reset;！拿上^red;******^reset;或者^red;******^reset;！
Texts.Eng: I am detect^red;*******^reset; ^red;*buzz*^reset;! Take ^red;******^reset; or it ^red;******^reset;!
I understand you wanting to leave, and I whole-heartedly agree with you. As I said, however, check everything you can for clues. This can't happen again. I won't let it.

I'll be with you during this investigation. I'm on vacation, but that doesn't mean I don't have to do my duty as director. It looks like you came in through their backup teleporter. Did something happen to the main?
I'm picking up biological signatures. Stand by while I ^red;****^reset;...oh dear. The weather is interfering with our connection. If I can no longer reach you, SAIL can guide you.

Texts.Chs: Lagash ni'mofghek Shoggoth! IA! IA! IA!
Texts.Eng: Lagash ni'mofghek Shoggoth! IA! IA! IA!
MacReady! What happened to him? What's on his face? That thing seems to be influencing him. I hate to encourage this, but please defend yourself. Put him out of his misery for his sake.
Not to worry, it's a short walk to the ^orange;Research Station^reset; down the cliff. Watch your step, it tends to be very icy there.

Oh my. The lock was destroyed. Perhaps you could try blasting the door open with an explosiv^red;***** ** ****^reset;? There seems to be little other choice. Hurry, a ^red;****^reset; storm is coming!

Texts.Chs: 哦- 哦不！那太可怕了，我...我们... *呕吐声*. 我们- 我们必须继续前进。弄清楚这里发生了什么，并让它不再发生。
Texts.Eng: Oh- oh no, this is horrible. I...we... *vomiting sounds*. We- we have to keep going. Find out what happened so it will never happen again.
Perhaps check the books on the shelves for a hint. You may need that to progress, and look for similar things in further rooms.
Secret knowledge! We should search these shelves and ^red;**** **^reset; anything we find. Who knows what useful information or ancient ^red;**** *****^reset;we might uncover in the process!
That can't be right. This has to be an error. Scans place the age of this place at somewhere around 1 billion years. I must know more. Keep going. I should ^red;***** *** ******^reset;!
The path seems to be blocked. Oh, there's a small tunnel that seems to lead somewhere. Perhaps a Translocator or a Microsphere tech would do the trick.

Texts.Chs: 电源断路器在这个走廊的尽头。在黑暗中请小心，我们不知道那里有什么东西。
Texts.Eng: The power breakers are at the end of this corridor. Be careful in the dark, we don't know what's down there.

Texts.Chs: 这里的风暴 ^red;******^reset; ^red;******^reset;。我的扫描仪 ^red;*bzzzzzzzzzz*^reset; 并且 ^red;******^reset;。 我 ^red;******^reset;。
Texts.Eng: The storm is ^red;******^reset; ^red;******^reset;. My scanners are ^red;*bzzzzzzzzzz*^reset; and ^red;******^reset;. I am ^red;******^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 这个房间的远处的墙上有一个安全开关。它应该能够控制实验室的主门，它能够让我们访问电源断路器，使我们能够看得更清楚。
Texts.Eng: There's a failsafe switch on the far wall of this room. It should override the main lab doors, which should give us access to the power breakers so we can see more clearly.

Texts.Chs: 这场暴风雪冷酷无情。前面有一些高高的悬崖。如果需要的话，你可以用它们挡风避雨。我们的连接也很快就会断开。
Texts.Eng: This blizzard is unrelenting. There are some tall cliffs up ahead. Use them for shelter from the wind if you need to. Our connection may fail soon, as well.

Texts.Chs: 这根支柱...这块石头...我甚至不能确定这到底是不是石头。它所含的物质与任何已知的矿物质都不符。我将继续前进，为了我的队伍和科学。
Texts.Eng: This pillar... this stone... We can't even be sure if this -is- stone. There aren't any similarities to known minerals within it. Continue onward, for the sake of our team and for science.

Texts.Chs: 这个雕塑有点类似于 ^red;********^reset; 废墟中的。有一个关键地区别与 ^red;*******^reset; 的因素，当然，也许是某种古老的废墟崇拜？
Texts.Eng: This sculpture somewhat resembles ^red;********^reset;e Ruin. There are key differe^red;*******^reset; factors, of course. Some sort of ancient Ruin worship, perhaps?

Texts.Chs: 这个小队到底遇到了什么？大家在哪？谁破坏了门锁？检查你能看见的所有事物。
Texts.Eng: What in the world happened to this team? Where is everyone? Who broke the lock? Check everything you can.

Texts.Chs: 这是什么 ^red;*****^reset; 形态，他们是由什么变成的？没有任何记录与这个...东西相吻合。不管这是个什么地方，它都将改写宇宙的历史。
Texts.Eng: What manner of ^red;*****^reset; is this, and what became of them? Nothing ever recorded matches this...thing. Whatever this place is, it will redefine galactic history.

Texts.Chs: 无论这是什么，都不像是我所见过的任何事物。我尝试分析但确实没能得到任何有用信息。而且它仍然在搏动着...
Texts.Eng: Whatever the hell this thing is, it reads unlike anything I have ever seen before. I literally get nothing when I try, yet it moves and pulses...

Texts.Chs: 我建议你小心行事，尽管我十分钦佩你敢于触摸这令人感觉不妙的祭坛的勇气。也许从古老的传说中，我们可以了解它的奥秘...
Texts.Eng: While I applaud your bravery even touching this altar, I would advise caution. It clearly is not a good thing. Perhaps some lore can shed light on how to use it...

Texts.Chs: ^orange;-在线-^reset; 你还活着！我确信你已经死了！你在这里发现了什么？我们的队伍出了什么事？尽快向我报告你的发现。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;-ONLINE-^reset; You're ALIVE! I thought for certain you were dead! What did you discover about the temple, and what happened to our team? Report to me as soon as you can with your findings.

Texts.Chs: ^red;*******滋滋滋滋滋滋滋滋滋滋*****^reset;  ^orange;-连接终止-^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^red;*******bzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzt*****^reset;  ^orange;-CONNECTION TERMINATED-^reset;

Texts.Chs: ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn!
Texts.Eng: ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn!
